name: Sumireko's Tactical Dream
description:
Sumireko's Tactical Dream 

its a touhou fan game, and submission for touhou fan game jam 8 

https://itch.io/jam/touhou-jam-8

Control

WASD to move

Space to Jump and next dialogue 

Right Click to aim

Left Click to shoot

Credits

Project Lead : Iz-Artz

Programing :  NaufalAfif2015  & Iz-Artz 

Artist : Aufa_Rosa

Character Modeler & Assets : NaufalAfif2015 & Iz-Artz

Rigging & Animation : Iz-Artz
